name: Fire Red Palette
description: Bold reds and oranges creating intense, passionate, and dramatic atmosphere

prompt.base: Fire red color palette, bold reds and oranges, intense colors, passionate tones, dramatic color scheme, fiery palette, powerful colors
prompt.positive: fire red colors, bold red (#B71C1C), crimson (#D32F2F), bright red accent (#FF5252), intense palette, passionate atmosphere, dramatic colors, fiery warmth, powerful presence, red color harmony
prompt.negative: cool colors, blues, greens, cold palette, muted tones, desaturated colors, pastel colors, soft palette

technical.use_cases: Intense scenes, passionate moods, dramatic atmospheres, action sequences

variations.name: Volcanic Fire
variations.modifier: deep reds, volcanic intensity, molten atmosphere, extreme heat, lava tones

variations.name: Romantic Fire
variations.modifier: passionate reds, romantic warmth, intimate atmosphere, love tones, sensual palette

variations.name: Danger Fire
variations.modifier: warning reds, danger signals, alert atmosphere, emergency tones, urgent palette

examples: A dramatic scene bathed in fire red colors, bold reds and oranges, intense atmosphere
An action sequence with fire red palette, passionate crimson accents, powerful red tones
